amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the executive branch from deploying troops to the southern border if the purpose of such deployment is to enforce immigration law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 429 printed in Part B of House Report 116-413 to prohibit the President from deploying troops on the southern border if the purpose of this deployment is to enforce immigration law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 241, 1 Present (Roll no. 467).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A052) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 241, 1 Present (Roll no. 467).
